Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Kayla Maglio
Reviews.Content: Great deal for the price. I have shopped around for a while for this camera and this is by far the best deal! Some of the extras that it comes with are a little cheap, like the extra flash. And it also says it comes with an SD card, but actually comes with a micro SD card, so I couldn't eve use my camera until I got the adapter for the micro :(. But overall a great price and a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Good and Hope better next time
Reviews.Author: RMEL
Reviews.Content: very nice to trade with your side, and I hope to do it again in future, wish you a very good luck

ProductInfo.Features:

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung NX1000 Mirrorless Wi-Fi Digital Camera (White) Kit with 20-50mm Lens & Samsung 50-200mm f/4.0-5.6 ED OIS II Lens. Includes 0.45X Wide Angle Lens, 2X Telephoto Lens, 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD), 16GB Memory Card & Much More!
